identifier.description: Unique identifier for the faction (e.g. com.pa.legion-expansion)

version.description: Semantic version of the faction data (e.g. 1.2.0)

author.description: Author or organization that created this faction

dateCreated.description: ISO 8601 date when faction was created (YYYY-MM-DD)

build.description: PA game build number this faction targets

mods.description: List of mod identifiers that compose this faction

backgroundImage.description: Path to faction background image relative to faction folder root

isBalanceMod.description: True if this is a balance mod that extends existing factions rather than defining a new one

baseFactions.description: Faction display names that this balance mod extends (e.g. MLA or Legion)
